history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00516
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROMOTING POSITIVE AND NON-VIOLENT DISCIPLINE OF CHILDREN AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
SHORT TITLE : The Positive And Non Violent Discipline Of Children Act
ABSTRACT : Aims to stop the following punishment to children: spanking, pinching, hitting with an object, twisting the ear, pulling the hair, slapping, confine in sack, and shaking.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : HERRERA-DY, BERNADETTE "BH" C.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Welfare
